directions: Blend strawberries, ice cubes, orange, carrot, banana, grapes, peach slices, pineapple chunks, broccoli florets, spinach, and milk together in a high-powered blender (such as Vitamix(R)) until desired consistency is reached, adding more milk if needed.
ingredients: 1/2 cup milk, or more as needed
title: Fruit and Vegetable Smoothie
